name: Duplicate Posts & Page
author: bPlugins

sections.description: Duplicate post and page plugin can easily create a clone of your post , page or custom post types in just one click ahead. You can duplicate pages, posts and custom post by single click and it will be saved as draft.
sections.installation: Installation is very easy. You can easily install it from WordPress repository.
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?
You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

short_description: A simple plugin to duplicate your posts, page or any custom post types in just one click.
description: Duplicate post and page plugin can easily create a clone of your post , page or custom post types in just one click ahead. You can duplicate pages, posts and custom post by single click and it will be saved as draft.
